name: Cozy (Heather)
description:
Cozy is a simple #flatgame created during the first two weeks of January 2019.  Inspired by the Danish concept of 'hygge', this game explores what 'coziness' means to me. I hope it also prompts the player to reflect on their own ideas about coziness.

Attributions

I created this game (conception, design, and programming) while learning to develop using Unity.

The game experiments with a cut-art, collage aesthetic. I combined silhouettes of clip art images with textures from high-res photos.  All of the visual resources are selections from pixabay.com, openclipart.org, and unsplash.com. 

The game audio comprises selections from freesound.org.
